__e: I'm just writing "rarely" on every one of these.
Especially given I am rarely at home, since I'm with him every night.
Things are crazy in the city with work and I'm barely home.
People go through their lives, rarely taking time to say "I love you," so... what's one day a year when you're forced to be nice to each other and acknowledge those who are important to us?
I know it seems like the truth is always the best way to go, but it hardly ever is.
They rarely do, in my experience.
I've never seen a man who has more right to be dead.
I've rarely seen someone fight so hard to stay alive.
No, I rarely saw the same one twice.
One wants... but one so seldom gets what one wants.
Well, you also know that I rarely do the right thing.
You see each other so rarely, which I don't understand at all, but that's your business.
You know, I almost feel bad about beating you. Rarely do I get to meet someone with your talents.
But facts are facts even if the fact is that facts are almost never heard.
I rarely see anybody except the neighbors... and they are mostly my relatives, some kind or other.
And people with such small eyes rarely have such big ideas.
The no-kids thing is not really a big deal 'cause I don't see them that much, anyway.
I don't really know, sir, but I'm never off by more than 30 seconds.
